summary: The work focuses on three main areas: (1) team reorganization from NVS and RTE Systems squads into the new Market Innovation and Optimization (MIO) team, requiring updates across multiple systems (DORA dashboards, HF Inspector, Sentry, JSON files); (2) checkout and payment flow improvements including OTP (One-Time Purchase) cart integration, charge-at-checkout experiments, and reactivation flow migrations; (3) Factor Form/GreenChef migration preparation including Klaviyo email setup, DNS configuration, Shopify domain authentication, and two-step login flow improvements.

decisions.what: Block MIO-30 until github-automation changes are merged for CODEOWNERS file updates
decisions.rationale: Cannot update team and Claim JSON files without the automation infrastructure in place

decisions.what: Create one cartID per session for OTP checkout
decisions.rationale: Prevent duplicate cart creation issues during checkout flow

decisions.what: Clean up feature flag for UPM vs legacy payment step before implementing handleOTPCheckoutSubmit
decisions.rationale: Technical debt cleanup needed before new OTP checkout flow implementation

decisions.what: Consolidate MIO-33 work into MIO-32 for HF Inspector updates
decisions.rationale: Avoid duplicate effort by handling both NVS and RTE Systems updates together

decisions.what: Hide payment banner for customers in C@C (Charge at Checkout) experiment variation
decisions.rationale: Different payment flow for experiment participants requires UI changes

decisions.what: Prototype alternative flows for change email step in two-step login
decisions.rationale: Current flow of transitioning back to step 1 was unexpected for users

initiatives.name: Team Reorganization - Market Innovation and Optimization (MIO)
initiatives.description: Consolidate NVS and RTE Systems squads into new MIO team with updates across all tooling and monitoring systems

initiatives.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase) Checkout Flow
initiatives.description: Implement complete OTP cart creation and checkout submission flow separate from subscription checkout

initiatives.name: Factor Form/GreenChef Migration
initiatives.description: Migrate Factor Form to new infrastructure including Klaviyo email setup, Shopify integration, and user experience improvements

initiatives.name: Backend Services Handover
initiatives.description: Document and execute handover/deprecation of backend services to other domains following TRE guidelines

initiatives.name: Reactivation Flow Migration
initiatives.description: Migrate reactivation flow components including premium shipping to new architecture

initiatives.name: Test Quarantine System Cleanup
initiatives.description: Address flaky tests in quarantine system to improve test reliability

initiatives.name: Charge at Checkout (C@C) Experiment
initiatives.description: Implement experiment variation for charging customers at checkout instead of traditional payment flow

blockers.description: Team and Claim JSON file updates blocked pending github-automation changes merge
blockers.impact: Cannot update repository ownership information for MIO team transition

technical_patterns.pattern: Hook-based architecture for UI logic separation
technical_patterns.context: Creating dedicated hooks like useCreateOTPCartForCheckout and useOrderConfirmationData to wrap data-access hooks with UI-specific logic, promoting separation of concerns
Using Statsig for gradual rollouts (GreenChef migration, C@C experiment) and conditional UI rendering based on experiment allocation
Systematic approach to isolate and fix flaky tests with success rate tracking (85-87% thresholds) before re-enabling in main test suite
Building Honeycomb dashboards with traces before deploying new features (redirection logic monitoring) to track performance and failure rates
Using NS and TXT records for third-party service authentication (Klaviyo, Recharge, SendGrid) to enable email delivery and domain verification

technical_patterns.pattern: Separate checkout flows for different purchase types
technical_patterns.context: Implementing distinct handleOTPCheckoutSubmit function to handle one-time purchases separately from subscription checkout logic
Migrating from Redux selectors to custom hooks for state management in reactivation flow (premium shipping)
Using /calculate/prospect/batch endpoint for efficient price retrieval across multiple components

work_themes: Email service integration and DNS configuration

dependencies.context: Team reorganization blocked on automation changes for CODEOWNERS file updates
New OTP flow requires cleanup of UPM vs legacy payment feature flags first
Email functionality depends on DNS record configuration and domain authentication
Custom domain authentication required for email delivery (failed payment recovery)
Investigating errors with multiple free cuts per category in meals/addons saving
Using Honeycomb queries to analyze test failure patterns and error messages
Feature gate setup required before migration can proceed
Premium shipping migration depends on price-service API for prospect pricing
